Toggle Menu

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer

SoftLayer Cloud Module

The SoftLayer cloud module is used to control access to the SoftLayer VPS system.

Use of this module only requires the apikey parameter. Set up the cloud configuration at:

/etc/salt/cloud.providers or /etc/salt/cloud.providers.d/softlayer.conf: 

my-softlayer-config:
  # SoftLayer account api key
  user: MYLOGIN
  apikey: JVkbSJDGHSDKUKSDJfhsdklfjgsjdkflhjlsdfffhgdgjkenrtuinv
  provider: softlayer

The SoftLayer Python Library needs to be installed in order to use the SoftLayer salt.cloud modules. See: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/SoftLayer

depends

softlayer

avail_images

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.avail_images(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a dict of all available VM images on the cloud provider.

avail_locations

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.avail_locations(
								call=None
								)

Details

List all available locations

avail_sizes

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.avail_sizes(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a dict of all available VM sizes on the cloud provider with relevant data. This data is provided in three dicts.

create

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.create(
								vm_
								)

Details

Create a single VM from a data dict

destroy

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.destroy(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Destroy a node.

CLI Example:

salt-cloud --destroy mymachine

get_configured_provider

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.get_configured_provider( )

Details

Return the first configured instance.

get_conn

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.get_conn(
								service='SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest'
								)

Details

Return a conn object for the passed VM data

get_location

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.get_location(
								vm_=None
								)

Arguments

Name Description
Return the location to use, in this order:

  • CLI parameter

  • VM parameter

  • Cloud profile setting

list_custom_images

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.list_custom_images(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a dict of all custom VM images on the cloud provider.

list_nodes

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.list_nodes(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider

list_nodes_full

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.list_nodes_full(
								mask='mask[id]',
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider

list_nodes_select

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.list_nodes_select(
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider, with select fields

list_vlans

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.list_vlans(
								call=None
								)

Details

List all VLANs associated with the account

script

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.script(
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the script deployment object

show_instance

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.softlayer.show_instance(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Show the details from SoftLayer concerning a guest
